actions.text: Amendment SA 3340 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 3340 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Scott SC to Amendment SA 3748. To require the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to annually review, update, and report on the facilities and property of the United States Government determined to be national security sensitive for purposes of review of real estate transactions under section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3340 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3340 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Scott SC to Amendment SA 3748.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to annually review, update, and report on the facilities and property of the United States Government determined to be national security sensitive for purposes of review of real estate transactions under section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950.
